snippet.title: Baseless and Particle Hearts Gameplay Trailer - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
First Break Labs presents two upcoming games. Baseless from Fermenter Games is a challenging planet-jumping shooter that defies gravity. Shooting = Movement: blast from planet to planet with 360° gravity, creatively demolishing every enemy in your path to save your family. Fire powerful weapons, adopt cute friends, and discover a galaxy worth fighting for! 

In Underwater Fire's Particle Hearts, explore a world made entirely of particles. Use special abilities to manipulate those particles, solve puzzles, avoid detection, and uncover the role you play in this sinister and beautiful land.  

Wishlist today!
Baseless: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1129260
Particle Hearts: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2074740

#convergenceshow #indiegames
